title: Scalebreaker
author: Babagannoosh
content: You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

When you hit a creature with this weapon, you can force them to make a DC17 constitution saving throw. On a failure, they lose resistance to your choice of one of the following damage types: cold, lightning, fire, acid, or poison. Once you use this ability, it may not be used again until you complete a short or long rest.
Proficiency with a longsword allows you to add your proficiency bonus to the attack roll for any attack you make with it.
